update.description:
Added copy constructor and assignment operator to MouseEvent to properly copy private data object. One place that uses this is [ModelManipulator](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/cdf65e4088f1fe7a0d3b9c6d8070aa91c94443a7/gazebo/gui/ModelManipulator.cc#ModelManipulator.cc-565)

This fixes the `double free or corruption` crashes I've been seeing when exiting gzclient.

Steps to reproduce crash: Insert box -> Translate it -> immediately hit Ctrl+Q to exit -> crash

Added test. Test crashes if the two functions are not there.

maybe related to issue #1676 - there could be other causes of the crash but this fixes one of them.
update.title: MouseEvent deep copy and gzclient exit crash fix

content.raw: The new functions [are covered](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-coverage-trusty-amd64/317/clover-report/_var_lib_jenkins_workspace_gazebo-any-coverage-trusty-amd64_gazebo_gazebo_common/MouseEvent_cc.html), but there's a few existing functions without test coverage. If you're in the mood, you can try mixing some of those functions into the test. Not required.
content.html: The new functions are covered, but there's a few existing functions without test coverage. If you're in the mood, you can try mixing some of those functions into the test. Not required.
